coreAttributes.name: Bunny Carrot-Cake
coreAttributes.description: An individually-wrapped slice of frosted carrot cake, complete with a decorative icing carrot on the top. On the wrapper, there's a very lewd image of a rabbit-girl being bred by a muscular rabbit-boy.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel like [npc.she] [npc.verb(need)] to breed...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_FERTILITY, 15)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_VIRILITY, 15)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_RESISTANCE_LUST, -25)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Tearing off the Bunny Carrot-Cake's plastic wrapper, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pop)] the small slice of cake into [npc.her] mouth. It turns out to be absolutely delicious, and after [npc.sheHas] swallowed down the sweet mess, a delightful carroty aftertaste lingers on [npc.her] [npc.tongue].
useDescriptions.otherUse: Tearing off the Bunny Carrot-Cake's plastic wrapper, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pop)] the small slice of cake into [npc2.namePos] mouth. It turns out to be absolutely delicious, and after [npc2.sheHas] swallowed down the sweet mess, a delightful carroty aftertaste lingers on [npc2.namePos] [npc2.tongue].
